column1: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. Opportunities don't happen. You create them. Quantum Computing Message Queue Cache Invalidation Sharding Edge Computing Framework Latency Optimization
Deployment Frontend Latency Optimization Agile Kafka A/B Testing

The only way to do great work is to love what you do. Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. WebSockets Version Control Machine Learning Virtual Machines Opportunities don't happen. You create them. Multi-threading
